name: Ball Simulator 2016
description:
The thrilling journey of a young ball as it progresses to adulthood.

Experience the balls early years in level one, where the ball navigates a maze representative of childhood innocence.

And experience the balls awkward teenage years in level two, where the ball navigates a maze representive of bullies and puberty and stuff.

Third level is just a maze. Nothing represented by the maze, just an ordinary maze.

Also at the end the ball dies that's what happens.
